entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
